vim: set ts=2 sw=2 expandtab:: vim modeline, not part of data
name: whatsupp
description: Native desktop app/wrapper for https://web.whatsapp.com. Built with Electron.

scripts.gettext: xgettext app/*.js -j --omit-header -o app/locale/messages.pot && xgettext app/html/*.html -L JavaScript -j --omit-header -o app/locale/messages.pot
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist node_modules app/node_modules yarn.lock app/yarn.lock
scripts.pkg:debian64: electron-installer-debian --bin WhatsUpp --src dist/WhatsUpp-linux-x64/  --dest dist/pkg --arch amd64 --section net --icon assets/icons/whatsupp.png
scripts.pkg-dev:debian64: electron-installer-debian --bin WhatsUpp-dev --src dist/WhatsUpp-dev-linux-x64/  --dest dist/pkg --arch amd64 --section net --icon assets/icons/whatsupp.png
